Kind regards, Rebecka

data.text:
@wilshawalex Hi, I cannot promise anything here as our Customer Care department need to handle your claim. Best is to make a claim and make sure to submit your receipts. You can also mention EU compensation while making your claim. https://t.co/wprQ9Zejqh 
Kind regards, Rebecka

data.text: @wilshawalex Hi, if we are unable to offer an alternative on your flight, you can save the receipts you get from booking a new flight and send them to our Customer Care so we can assist with compensation for the homebound. This can be done here: https://t.co/OzrIxYNv63 Kind regards, Rebecka

@marcnoruega Hello! Our phone support is open but the wait time might be longer than usual due to a heavy load of calls. We are sorry for the inconvenience, please hold and an agent will answer the call as soon as possible. Our opening hours can be found at https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj

//Anton

data.text:
@_fervp Hello 
Thank you for contacting us. 
Unfortunately we can not affect the handling time with SAS customer care. When they have looked at your case they will reply by e-mail and any further issues with this matter can be advised to them in that conversation. 
Best regards /Anna

data.text: @e_extremena Hi e_extremena. You can use your voucher to book trips with departure after the voucher's validity, as long as you book the trip before it expires. you can change it without penalty until 72 hours before first departure for international trips.

data.text:
@stokkink Hej, 

Sedan den 11:e April flyger vi mellan Köpenhamn och Aarhus. Flygen mellan Köpenhamn och Amsterdam är schemalagda att starta igen den 1:a Juni.

Hälsningar
Peter

@NikolaWalga Hi, 

We have flights scheduled in May. It is easiest to see if you go to our homepage, add the route and then press the field for date. If you press Low price calendar in the top of the calendar,  it will show a price on the dates we have flights scheduled.

Regards,
Peter

@santakatarina67 Hej, 

Våra tekniker jobbar med det men vi har inte fått besked om någon tid än. Om du kontaktar oss via messenger eller chat så kan vi se till att ditt konto tas med i deras felanmälan.  https://t.co/z4gOZAAJQJ

Hälsningar
Peter

data.text:
@Andreas23102873 Hi Andreas!

We will re-open the Star Alliance booking online as soon as circumstances normalize. It's still possible to book a Star Alliance ticket by contacting SAS Customer Service by phone.
Customer Service/Eurobonus:
https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj

Kind regards, Christoffer

data.text:
@VickiP45 You can create a new case at cusomer care. Contact them here:
https://t.co/OzrIxYNv63 select "General Complaint or compliment", Select "other" - "Customer service" , "get back on pending inquiry", to contact customer care again. Send with your previous caseID in the form.

@VickiP45 Hi Vicki!  If you are waiting on a refund you can write to us via our live-chat on SAS webpage or write to us on messenger, We can take a look at your booking there and help you. Kind regards, Jonna.

data.text: @LinneaSchossow Hi Linnea! thank you for contacting us! if you cannot log in you can try to use google chrome via a computer, reset your password, deleted history, cookies and cash and checked that the correct e-mail is registered. If you have, IT department is currently working on it.

data.text: @LiAnnTravels Hi! Vouchers have a specific currency so for example if you have NOK , it must be used on https://t.co/2nu0liyKkB, otherwise you can get that error. Kind regards, Jonna.

@stokeygurl Hi, 

Our european support sites are open Mon–Fri : 09.00–17.00 CET (English and local languages: Finnish, French, German, Russian, Spanish) , Mon–Fri: 17.00–19.00 CET (only English). 

Regards,
Peter

data.text:
@confuciusspider Hi confuciousspider, when a bag gets lost it can be a lot of different reasons as to why this happens. Most bags are located within 24 hours and returned to the customer with the next available flight.
Kind regards, Rebecka

urls.title: Baggage

data.text:
@confuciusspider Hi confuciousspider, I am terribly sorry to hear that your wife's luggage did not arrive. If you have not yet reported your bag missing, and the last flight you had was with SAS you can report your bag here: https://t.co/ojhL9dIf2x
Kind regards, Rebecka

@eleanoreducates Hi eleanordeducates, I recommend you to remove or hide your tweet as it contains private information. If you still have not received assistance on this, please contact us on chat, phone or on Facebook Messenger so we can assist you. https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj
Kind regards, Rebecka

@stokeygurl Hi again Stokeygurl! Our Customer Service are open Monday–Friday: 17.00–19.00 CET, Saturday: 09.00–17.00 CET Sunday: 09.00–18.00 CET  

Kind regards, Isak
